original_text: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
korean_text: 내 죄악이 내 머리에 넘쳐서 무거운 짐 같으니 내가 감당할 수 없나이다

sentences.original_text: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head:
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 죄악이 내 머리 위로 넘어갔나니

sentences.original_text: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
